Some Lesser Known Facts About Sreelekha Mitra

Does Sreelekha Mitra smoke?: No

Does Sreelekha Mitra drink alcohol?: Not Known

Sreelekha Mitra started her career in the early 1990s.

She made debut in the media industry with a TV ad of ‘Lays’ with Saif Ali Khan and after that in ‘Coca-Cola’ ad with Aamir Khan.

She is well known for her work in the movie ‘Kantatar’ which won her a BFJA Award and an Anandalok Award.

She was the judge of the Bengali popular comedy show ‘Mirakkel’.

She has also been a part of ABP Ananda (Bengali News Channel) as an anchor for two years.

In 2003, she won National Film Award for the Best Feature Film ‘Mando Meyer Upakshan’.

She met her husband on the sets of Bengali telefilm ‘Teen Satti’

After a divorce, she is still in touch with her husband who looks after his daughter when Sreelekha goes out for long shooting.

During her childhood, she dreamed of having a huge LCD TV in her bedroom.

She wants to keep her daughter away from the limelight.
